modules.title: Game Loops and Rendering
modules.description: Building a game loop and basic rendering in C++.

steps.content: A game loop updates and renders the game state. Learn to implement it using SDL or SFML in C++.

modules.title: Physics and AI
modules.description: Implementing physics and basic AI in games.

steps.content: Physics handles collisions and movement. AI controls NPC behavior. Learn to implement them in C++.
